 Read my story

(Like this meerkat animaton)

This website is, just like me, a work in progress. It was built during my first four weeks of learning web development. While I do try to improve it regularly, I currently dedicate most of my time to studying and working on other projects related to the program I am enrolled in.


However, as I improve my skills and knowledge along the way this website will receive more and more attention. At this point in time I am working on improving the mobile experience since it was not built using the mobile-first approach, which was definitely one of my bigger mistakes in this project.

Designed and build by Patrick Lemmer
